# Empathy Health Clinic

> Empathy Health Clinic is a leading mental health provider in Orlando, Florida offering psychiatry, therapy, and counseling services. Our board-certified psychiatrists and licensed therapists provide medication management, psychotherapy, and comprehensive psychiatric care for adults in Winter Park, Orlando, Lake Mary, Altamonte Springs, and throughout Central Florida. Most major insurance accepted.

## Quick Facts

- **Location**: 2281 Lee Rd, Suite 102, Winter Park, FL 32810
- **Phone**: (386) 848-8751
- **Email**: providers@empathyhealthclinic.com
- **Service Area**: Orlando, Winter Park, Lake Mary, Altamonte Springs, Kissimmee, Apopka, Casselberry, Longwood, Oviedo, Lake Nona, Downtown Orlando, UCF area
- **Telehealth**: Available throughout Florida
- **New Patient Appointments**: Same-week availability
- **Insurance**: Cigna, Aetna, United Healthcare, Blue Cross Blue Shield, UMR, Medicare, Medicaid, Oscar Health, Tricare, Sunshine Health

## Services Offered

### Psychiatry Services
- [Psychiatric Evaluation](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/psychiatric-evaluation): Comprehensive initial mental health assessments
- [Medication Management](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/medication-management-orlando): Psychiatric medication prescribing and monitoring
- [Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/psychiatrist-orlando): Board-certified psychiatrists in Orlando FL
- [Online Psychiatrist Florida](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/online-psychiatrist-florida): Virtual psychiatry appointments statewide
- [Same-Day Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/same-day-psychiatrist-orlando): Urgent psychiatric care with quick appointments

### Therapy Services
- [Therapy Services](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/therapy): Individual therapy and psychotherapy
- [Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/cognitive-behavioral-therapy): Evidence-based CBT for anxiety and depression
- [EMDR Therapy](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/emdr-therapy): Trauma processing therapy
- [Couples Counseling](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/couples-counseling): Relationship therapy
- [Virtual Therapy](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/virtual-therapy): Telehealth therapy appointments

### Specialized Treatment Programs
- [TMS Treatment](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/tms-treatment): Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation for treatment-resistant depression
- [Crisis Therapy](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/crisis-therapy): Urgent mental health support
- [Stress Management](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/stress-management): Stress and anxiety coping strategies

## Conditions Treated

### Anxiety Disorders
- [Anxiety Treatment Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/anxiety-treatment): Generalized anxiety, panic attacks, social anxiety
- [Anxiety Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/anxiety-psychiatrist-orlando): Medication and therapy for anxiety

### Depression
- [Depression Treatment](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/depression-treatment): Major depression, persistent depressive disorder
- [Depression Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/depression-psychiatrist-orlando): Depression specialists

### ADHD
- [ADHD Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/adhd-psychiatrist-orlando): Adult ADHD diagnosis and treatment
- [ADHD Testing Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/adhd-testing-orlando): Comprehensive ADHD evaluations
- [Adult ADHD Treatment Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/adult-adhd-treatment-orlando): ADHD medication management

### Trauma & PTSD
- [PTSD Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/ptsd-psychiatrist-orlando): Trauma-focused treatment
- [Trauma Specialist Near Me](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/trauma-specialist-near-me): EMDR and trauma therapy

### Bipolar Disorder
- [Bipolar Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/bipolar-psychiatrist-orlando): Mood stabilization and bipolar care

### OCD
- [OCD Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/ocd-psychiatrist-orlando): Obsessive-compulsive disorder treatment

### Other Conditions
- [Insomnia Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/insomnia-psychiatrist-orlando): Sleep disorders
- [Schizophrenia Psychiatrist Orlando](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/schizophrenia-psychiatrist-orlando): Psychotic disorders

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How much does a psychiatrist cost in Orlando?
The cost varies based on insurance coverage. With insurance, initial evaluations typically have a copay of $20-$60. Without insurance, initial psychiatric evaluations range from $250-$400, and follow-up medication management visits cost $100-$200. We accept most major insurance plans.

### Does Empathy Health Clinic accept new patients?
Yes, we are actively accepting new patients and offer same-week appointments for most services. Visit our [New Patients](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/new-patients) page to get started.

### Do you offer telehealth/virtual appointments?
Yes, we offer virtual therapy and telepsychiatry appointments throughout Florida. Our online services are covered by most insurance plans at the same rate as in-person visits.

### What insurance plans do you accept?
We accept Cigna, Aetna, United Healthcare, Blue Cross Blue Shield, UMR, Medicare, Medicaid, Oscar Health, Tricare, and Sunshine Health. See our [Insurance](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/insurance) page for details.

### How do I schedule an appointment?
Call (386) 848-8751 or visit our [Request Appointment](https://empathyhealthclinic.com/request-appointment) page to schedule online.

### What is the difference between a psychiatrist and a therapist?
A psychiatrist is a medical doctor (MD) who can prescribe medication and provide medical treatment for mental health conditions. A therapist provides talk therapy and counseling but cannot prescribe medication. We offer both services for comprehensive care.

*For emergency mental health services, please call 988 (Suicide & Crisis Lifeline) or go to your nearest emergency room.*
